item.description:
August Conscious Movie: Youth Producing Change
Friday, August 28th â€¢ 7:30 p.m.

In August, we will see the movie "Youth Producing Change". Save the date as this is not a movie that you can find in regular movie stores. I'll give more info about the movie later in the month or please visit this link to see a trailer for the movie:

http://www.amplifyyou...

See you soon and have a nice summer,
Rev. Christine

This meetup is free, but donations are welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: We're just around the corner from the Stony Brook T-stop on the Orange line.
item.name: Conscious Movie: Youth Producing Change
